description: Funding the Commons will dive into two areas of rapid innovation underpinning fundamental infrastructure for navigating the digital-physical commons: AI and the Open Web.

sessions.name: FtC Keynote: Sustainability of critical OSS projects
sessions.description: Funding the Commons Keynote with Brian Behlendorf of Linux Foundation.

sessions.name: FtC: Network Funding Model
sessions.description: Juan Benet of Protocol Labs will share his thoughts on the Network Funding Model.

sessions.name: Introduction to FtC: Open Source Day
FtC: Gitcoin 2.0 with Kevin Owocki
sessions.description: Kevin Owocki will share Gitcoin 2.0 and public goods funding as a competitive advantage for OSS/web3 projects.

sessions.name: FtC: Funding the Future of the Web, Fireside Chat
sessions.description: A fireside chat with Brendan Eich (Mozilla), Danny O'Brien (Filecoin Foundation), and Mehan Jayasuriya(Mozilla).

sessions.name: Ftc: Workshop Previews
sessions.description: Join LauNaMu (Optimism), Danny O'Brien (Filecoin Foundation), Frank Nagle (Harvard Business School), Manuel and Yochai Benkler (Harvard Law School) in workshop previews.

sessions.name: FtC: [Crypto] Grant Funding
sessions.description: Robin Berjon wll moderate a panel discussion with members from IPFS , Octant, Ethereum Foundation, and Mozilla focused on driving growth in an ecosystem.  What worked and what didn't?

sessions.name: FtC Keynote: History of Open Source
FtC: LLMs as a Commons
sessions.description: Join Juan Benet (Protocol Labs) with members from Stability AI, Hugging Face, and Fast AI for a panel discussion.

sessions.name: Introduction to FtC - AI Day
sessions.description: Begin AI Day with Cameron Dennis (NEAR), Era Qian (Edge), Dawn Song (RDI), and David Casey (Funding the Commons).

sessions.name: FtC: Alignment and Safety? Sure, but at what price?
sessions.description: Panel discussion with Terah Lyons (Albright Stonebridge Group), Evan Miyazono (Atlas Computing), plus members from Anthropic, Far.Ai, Open AI.

sessions.name: FtC The World I See: The Current State of Open Source AI
sessions.description: Fireside chat and book signing with Dawn Song (RDI) and Fei Fei Li (Stanford Human-Centered Artificial Intelligence)

sessions.name: FtC: Re-Introducing NEAR AI
sessions.description: Learn about Near AI with Co-Founder, Alex Skidanov.

sessions.name: Funding the Commons Party
sessions.description: Afterparty for Funding the Commons and Earth Commons, with LabWeek Public Goods.
